item.title: Mentioned by Hamilton Spectator
item.description:
Teen's 'purple power' celebrated on Parliament Hill
Cassidy's member of Parliament, Geoff Regan, drafted the Purple Day Act, which passed last year. He felt that more people needed to know about the condition and have compassion for those who have it. The Canadian Press. User Comments. Please wait.
